deleteNote.title: Kuna tabbata?
deleteNote.message: Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba. Wannan zai share bayanin kula har abada.

deleteSalesRep.title: Kuna tabbata?
deleteSalesRep.message: Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba. Wannan zai cire wannan wakilin tallace-tallace har abada.

logout.title: Fita
logout.message: Kuna tabbatar kuna son fita daga asusun ku?

deleteProduct.title: Share Kaya
deleteProduct.message: Kuna tabbatar kuna son share wannan kaya? Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba.

deleteSale.title: Share Tallace-tallace
deleteSale.message: Kuna tabbatar kuna son share wannan tallace-tallace? Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba.

deleteStore.title: Share Shago
deleteStore.message: Kuna tabbatar kuna son share wannan shago? Wannan zai share duk kayayyaki da tallace-tallace da ke da alaƙa da wannan shago.

withdrawal.title: Cire Kudaden Da Kuka Samu
withdrawal.description: Shigar da bayanan cirewa a ƙasa
withdrawal.processingNote: Ana aiwatar da cirewa a cikin sa'o'i 24-48. Tabbatar cewa bayanan asusun ku daidai ne.
